metadata.description: Continuous non-interactive implementation of the complete Agent Factory Roadmap v7 (Phases 0–35).
metadata.author: AgentFactoryExpert

phases.title: System Consolidation and Verification
phases.action: Verify project structure, governance kernel integrity, and baseline configuration.

phases.title: Core Infrastructure Deployment
phases.action: Deploy core services (HOL, Redis, Postgres) and schema migrations.

phases.title: Governance Kernel and Middleware
phases.action: Implement compliance middleware and audit API.

phases.title: Cloud Logging Integration
phases.action: Enable OpenTelemetry + GCP logging integration.

phases.title: Dashboard and Alerts Framework
phases.action: Implement UI alert system and real-time status cards.

phases.title: Governance Maturity Extensions
phases.action: Expand governance controls and ethical drift monitoring.

phases.title: Federation Bus and Control Plane
phases.action: Deploy bus API and context manifest for multi-agent coordination.

phases.title: Documentation and Deployment
phases.action: Generate internal docs and deployment scripts.

phases.title: Growth Autonomy Framework
phases.action: Implement ReflectiveSync and growth loop modules.

phases.title: Governance Feedback Integration
phases.action: Connect Archy ↔ Genesis ↔ Expert feedback via control plane API.

phases.title: Dashboard HITL Expansion
phases.action: Add Expert Console dock and proposal review workflow.

phases.title: Continuous Evolution
phases.action: Enable learning compaction and periodic re-training.

phases.title: Final Integration and Snapshot
phases.action: Run integration tests and export /governance/factory_build_snapshot_v7.json.

phases.title: Multi-Tenant Federation Foundation
phases.action: Create /orgs/<tenant_id>/ structure and tenant manifest.

phases.title: Authentication and Billing System
phases.action: Implement OAuth2, SSO, and Stripe billing integration.

phases.title: Organization Dashboard Overlay
phases.action: Extend UI for multi-org analytics and RBAC.

phases.title: Tenant-Scoped Expert Instances
phases.action: Deploy dedicated or shared Expert containers per tenant.

phases.title: Shared Meta-Agents Layer
phases.action: Deploy Prometheus (R&D) and Compliance Kernel meta-agents.

phases.title: Agent Export and Import System
phases.action: Create .afpkg packaging tool and import/export UI.

phases.title: Marketplace and Portal
phases.action: Build /frontend/website and marketplace modules with search API.

phases.title: Enterprise Controls and BYO-LLM Integration
phases.action: Implement tenant LLM policies and selector UI.

phases.title: Global Federation Governance Kernel
phases.action: Deploy cross-tenant audit aggregator and compliance reports.

phases.title: System Finalization and Release
phases.action: Validate build, generate release manifest, and notify admin.

phases.title: Frontend Public Website Deployment
phases.action: Deploy Next.js marketing site with docs and pricing pages.

phases.title: Admin Console and Analytics Portal
phases.action: Add usage, billing, and meta-agent monitoring dashboards.

phases.title: Federation Marketplace Launch
phases.action: Publish initial .afpkg agents and crew catalog.

phases.title: Enterprise Security and Audit Hardening
phases.action: Implement cross-org encryption and SOC-ready audit trails.

phases.title: Partner Program and API SDK Development
phases.action: Build REST and Python/JS SDKs for external developers.

phases.title: Federated Learning Pilot
phases.action: Enable safe meta-training across tenant insights.

phases.title: Industry Template Factories
phases.action: Create pre-built agent packages for Finance, Healthcare, Education.

phases.title: AI Marketplace Ecosystem Expansion
phases.action: Open community publishing and licensing capabilities.

phases.title: Continuous Governance Review Cycle
phases.action: Schedule quarterly meta-audits and ethical drift summaries.

phases.title: Public Release and Growth Autonomy V2
phases.action: Finalize public launch and enable autonomous improvement pipeline.

phases.title: Post-Deployment Validation
phases.action: Verify all subsystems and archive /governance/factory_build_snapshot_v8.json.

phases.title: Long-Term Evolution Scheduling
phases.action: Plan v8 R&D and future federation enhancements.

phases.title: Final Audit and Certification
phases.action: Run ethical audit and certify Agent Factory Federation for public use.
